content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### First Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (0.0, 0.0)) which is currently full of coal (50/50) and is producing iron plates.
- Stone furnace (position (2.0, 0.0)) which has no ingredients to smelt.
- Stone furnace (position (4.0, 0.0)) which is full of coal (50/50) and has no ingredients to smelt.
- Stone furnace (position (6.0, 0.0)) which has no ingredients to smelt.
- Wooden chest (position (8.5, 0.5)) which is currently empty.

### Copper Plate Mine at position (-15.5, -50.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position (-15.5, -50.5)) which is extracting iron ore.

### Copper Cable Factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position (x1, y1)) and inserter (position (z1, a)) that puts into the assembling machine.
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace to the assembling machine.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into the furnace
- Ensure the furnace has available inventory space before attempting to insert items. The current error indicates that the furnace is full (50/50 items).

### Errors when attempting to insert items from an empty inventory
- Make sure to gather sufficient resources before attempting to insert them into any structure. The error indicates that there is no iron ore available in the inventory.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items. 

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
